Job Location: Ogudu GRA, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

	Our client, a reputable real estate firm, is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Human Resources Managerto join their dynamic team.


Key Requirements


	Minimum of 4 years of proven experienceas an HR Manager in a real estate company.
	Strong knowledge of HR policies, labor laws, and best practices.
	Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to manage recruitment, employee relations, performance management, and training programs.
	Proficiency in HR software and Microsoft Office tools.

	Oversee the day-to-day HR operations.

?350,000 monthly
